leitej.xml.om

Class XmlomWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • leitej.xml.om.XmlomWriter

  • public final class XmlomWriter
extends java.lang.Object
    XML Object Modelling Writer

    The stream writer do not allow send two references from the same object without flush the stream.
    Author:
    Julio Leite
    See Also:
    XmlomReader

      Creates a new instance of XmlomOutputStream.

      • flush

        public void flush()
           throws java.io.IOException
        Flushes this writer stream and forces any buffered output xmlom objects to be written out.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs.

      • close

        public void close()
           throws java.io.IOException
        Closes this output stream and releases any system resources associated with this stream. A closed writer cannot perform output operations and cannot be reopened.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs.
